Garbage management system, consciousness of the citizens, gap between the authority and the citizens
Improve management System, increasing consciousness, reducing gap between the authority and the citizens.
Industrial activity , Agricultural chemicals , Improper disposal of waste.

Buy biodegradable products,Store all liquid chemicals and waste in spill proof containers,Eat organic foods that are grown without pesticides,Do not use pesticides if you can,Use a drip tray to collect engine oil,Buy products that have little packaging.
Billboards, open storage of trash, space debris, telephone towers, electric wires, buildings and automobiles

Billboards should be allowed tohang at roadside for a specificperiod of time and after that timethese should be removed to avoidunwanted burden of billboards, Wires should be stretched byfollowing a well-planned design sothat these do not cause anyproblem to view things of distance.
Shop of market area of the Dhaka city
Reducing light using at market area
use of water as a coolant by power plants and industrial manufacturers
Water used as coolant and ejected back into water bodies â€“ Mainly, the water that is used as coolant and transferred back to natural water bodies is the chief reason for thermal pollution
Industrial Waste, Human Garbage, Unplanned Drainage System
